scripts.watch: npm i && bower install && gulp watch
scripts.fix:
PREFIX="# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-"; find . -name '._*' | xargs rm ; for f in $(find . -name '*.py' -and -not -path '*/migrations/*' -and -not -path '*/venv/*'); do echo "=================" ; echo $f; autopep8 -ri --max-line-length=10000 $f; flake8 $f; isort -rc $f; grep -qFe "$PREFIX" $f || echo "$PREFIX
$(cat $f)" > $f ; done
